thread.title: UK's Big Blue Madness being held tonight
thread.title_full: UK's Big Blue Madness being held tonight

title: UK's Big Blue Madness being held tonight
text:
UK's Big Blue Madness being held tonight Updated: Fri 7:17 AM, Oct 16, 2015 / Article 
LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) - Wildcat fans wait all year for it and today it's finally here! 
UK's annual Big Blue Madness is tonight and fans will get their first opportunity to see both the men's and women's basketball teams in action. The madness begins with the introduction of both teams players, followed by a scrimmage. 
Last year, both teams made the NCAA Tournament and look to do it again this season. Those in attendance tonight will get a chance to welcome back returning players and meet each teams newest members. 
Big Blue Madness will begin at 7 p.m. at Rupp Arena. Fans can also watch the entire event live on ESPN's SEC Network. Many of the players on this year's @KentuckyMBB roster expect #BBM15 to be, well, madness: http://t.co/WDIxLTK8hJ pic.twitter.com/ORGI9FggsA
